title: "Chi squared"

```{r}
armidale_data <- read.csv("Data sets/ABS_2011_Armidale_Weekly_Income.csv")
```

Let's take a look at the structure of the data.

```{r}
str(armidale_data)
```

We can see that we have 390 observations and 28 variables. For the purposes of this workshop, we don't need all of these variables. We can create a new dataframe with the variables we would like.

`{r} library(tidyverse)} new_armidale_data <- armidale_data %>%   select(c(Age, Sex, Total.Personal.Income..weekly.))`

We can take a look at the structure again to make sure it is ok.

```{r}
str(new_armidale_data)
```
